item.title: A Year in Moments: 2023 Video Blog
item.description:
Video snippets and highlights from my 2023 experiences, journeys, and everyday moments. Throughout the year, I captured short video clips documenting my travels, adventures, and life events using my camera.

For summaries of my 2023 photos, please check out:  jerrysmd.github.io/gallery

And to read recaps of the books I enjoyed in 2023:  jerrysmd.notion.site

item.title: Color Grading DJI D-Cinelike Footage in DaVinci Resolve
item.description: This blog post will focus on color grading in DaVinci Resolve. It will introduce DJI’s D-Cinelike, D-Log color profiles, Sony camera S-Log, and explain the differences between these log formats and normal color profiles. The goal is to provide a tutorial for colorists on how to get the most out of log footage when color grading in DaVinci Resolve.

item.title: DaVinci Resolve Introduction
item.description: DaVinci Resolve is the worldâ€™s only solution that combines editing, color correction, visual effects, motion graphics and audio post production all in one software tool! Its elegant, modern interface is fast to learn and easy for new users, yet powerful for professionals.
